list.name: Muse
list.definition: To think about something in a creative way, especially by imagining what it would be like or how it might happen.

list.name: Aquifer
list.definition: A body of permeable rock that can contain or transmit groundwater.

list.name: English
list.definition: The language of the United Kingdom, the United States, and the commonwealth countries.

list.name: Google
list.definition: A search engine that was founded by Page and Brin.

list.name: Apple
list.definition: A type of fruit; also the name of a large tech company
